page.title: 17Family Survey in Waverton
page.content: 50% of the school families returned the survey sheets.No replies were received from the unemployed. {Length of stay in the area.}Less than 1yr._10%.Less than 5yrs._50%. Only 5% of the families have lived in the area for more than 20yrs.Longest for 150yrs.{Employment.}40% of parents work within 5mls.18% of parents work more than 29mls away,with one person travelling 500mls to a North Sea Oil Rig with others in Africa.{Types of {work.}17% are Engineers or Mechanics. 8%work on the land or on building sites.45%work in Offices,with 15% of these being Managers.!5% of the total work at ShellUK,ICI,or Unilever,whilst 25%work for the Local Authority.A further 6% work in Health service.50% of Mothers do not seek employment, those that work are Teachers,Nurses or Social Workers.
